meanings.definition: The act of serving food or drink to someone.
meanings.sent1: The waitress brought the servings to our table with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The caterer provided excellent servings at the event.
meanings.sent3: The servings were so delicious that everyone wanted seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her servings of kindness warmed the hearts of all the guests.
meanings.sent5: The servings were presented elegantly, making the meal even more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: A portion of food or drink served to someone.
meanings.sent1: He requested a larger servings of dessert after finishing his meal.
meanings.sent2: The chef carefully plated the servings for each guest at the banquet.
meanings.sent3: The servings were so generous that no one left the party hungry.
meanings.sent4: The servings of soup were like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The servings of cake were beautifully decorated and tasted heavenly.

meanings.definition: The amount of food or drink that is enough for one person.
meanings.sent1: Each servings of pasta was perfectly cooked and seasoned.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offers different sizes of servings to cater to various appetites.
meanings.sent3: The servings of juice were so refreshing on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent4: Her servings of advice were always thoughtful and helpful.
meanings.sent5: The servings of salad were crisp and colorful, a delight to eat.
